directions.step:
Cut tomatoes in half and arrange in an oiled shallow casserole. Season with salt and pepper and spread each with a tablespoon of sugar. Cover with crumbs and dot with butter. Bake at 350 F until tender but still firm - the time will depend on the size and greenness of the tomatoes - but will probably range from 30 to 40 minutes.
Note: 1/2" slices may be baked in this same manner. Bake 25 minutes.
From "The Farmington Cookbook." Louisville, KY: Farmington, 1968. Pg. 167. Posted by Cathy Harned. Posted to EAT-L Digest 18 Sep 96
